required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Differential Expression and Analysis of Peripheral Plasma Exosome miRNA in Patients With Myocardial Infarction
clinical_study.official_title: Differential Expression and Analysis of Peripheral Plasma Exosome miRNA in Patients With Myocardial Infarction

lead_sponsor.agency: Xinhua Hospital, Shanghai Jiao Tong University School of Medicine

clinical_study.source: Xinhua Hospital, Shanghai Jiao Tong University School of Medicine

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of this study is to determine the miRNA expression profile in peripheral blood exosomes of patients with myocardial infarction and to investigate its relationship with myocardial infarction.

detailed_description.textblock: Collect exosomes in peripheral blood of patients with myocardial infarction, compare the expression of miRNA with healthy volunteers, find out the miRNAs with significant differences, and explore its relationship with the development of myocardial infarction.

primary_outcome.measure: Determination of differential expression of miRNA by second-generation sequencing technology

secondary_outcome.measure: Diagnostic value of the differential microRNAs evaluate by qPCR in patients of myocardial infarction

arm_group.description: Patients admitted with the diagnosis of myocardial infarction.
Patients admitted without the diagnosis of myocardial infarction.

intervention.description: Collect exosomes in peripheral blood of patients and extract miRNAs from them.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Age > 18 years ST elevation by ECG diagnostic of STEMI Evidency of coronary occlusion in coronariography Signed informed consent
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients who will undergo immediate PCI Pregnant and lactating women Patients with mental disorders Patients are using other experimental drugs; Refusal to provide informed.

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Xinhua Hospital, Shanghai Jiao Tong University School of Medicine
